high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia RTX 3080 Power: Q1 2022 release, uses 450W power - TweakTown
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is planning to release the RTX 3080 GPU in the first quarter of 2022. This model will have a high power consumption of up to 450W.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces a new, powerful gaming graphics card that is expected to be popular and used for high-performance computing tasks.

high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA Readies GeForce RTX 3080 With GA102-220, RTX 3050 Ti With GA106-150 & RTX 3050 With GA107-350 GPUs - Wccftech
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is preparing to release the GeForce RTX 3080 GPU, with models for the RTX 3050 Ti and RTX 3050 GPUs. These new GPUs will use different architecture code names.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces multiple high-performance gaming graphics cards that are expected to be in high demand.

high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA RTX 3080 Ti GPU could be coming to supercharge gaming laptops - TechRadar
high_impact_events.summary: There are rumors that the RTX 3080 Ti GPU from NVIDIA is set to enhance gaming experiences on laptops. This would provide high-performance computing for portable devices.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces a new, powerful GPU variant with potential impact on laptop and desktop gaming.

high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA Readies GeForce RTX 3080 With GA102-220, RTX 3050 Ti With GA106-150 & RTX 3050 With GA107-350 GPUs - Wccftech
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is preparing to release the GeForce RTX 3080 GPU, with models for the RTX 3050 Ti and RTX 3050 GPUs. These new GPUs will use different architecture code names.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces multiple high-performance gaming graphics cards that are expected to be in high demand.

high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA RTX 3080 Ti GPU could be coming to supercharge gaming laptops - TechRadar
high_impact_events.summary: There are rumors that the RTX 3080 Ti GPU from NVIDIA is set to enhance gaming experiences on laptops. This would provide high-performance computing for portable devices.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces a new, powerful GPU variant with potential impact on laptop and desktop gaming.

high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA introduces the new RTX 3080 Ti GPU with improved performance - TechCrunch
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA has announced the introduction of a new RTX 3080 Ti GPU that features enhanced performance compared to previous models. This product is expected to be highly sought after by gamers and professionals.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event introduces an improved version of a popular gaming graphics card, which could drive demand and sales.

medium_impact_events.headline: Nvidia officially discontinues Game Ready driver support for Kepler GPUs - VideoCardz.com
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA has stopped supporting its Game Ready drivers for the Kepler architecture, which includes GeForce GTX 980 and earlier models. This means users will have to use alternative drivers.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event affects a significant number of GPU models that were used by many gamers and developers.

medium_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA officially discontinues Game Ready driver support for Kepler GPUs - VideoCardz.com
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is ending the support of its Game Ready drivers for Kepler architecture, including models like GeForce GTX 980 and earlier.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event affects a significant number of GPU models used by many gamers and developers.

medium_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA's Game Ready drivers are no longer supported on Windows 10 - Wccftech
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA announced that its Game Ready drivers will be discontinued for Windows 10, requiring users to switch to the latest and most stable drivers from NVIDIA.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event affects a significant number of users who rely on these drivers for their gaming systems.

low_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA's RTX 3080 Ti GPU could be getting a subtle 2GB VRAM upgrade - PCGamesN
low_impact_events.summary: There are rumors that NVIDIA may be planning to introduce a subtle 2GB VRAM upgrade for the RTX 3080 Ti GPU. This would improve its performance and efficiency.
low_impact_events.rationale: This event is about a possible minor improvement in an existing product, which could have limited impact.
